entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
